mapper.select: SELECT l.local_auth_id, l.username, l.password, l.create_time, l.last_edit_time, p.user_id, p.local_auth_id, p.name, p.gender, p.email, p.user_type, p.create_time, p.last_edit_time, p.enable_status FROM tb_local_auth l LEFT JOIN tb_person_info p ON l.local_auth_id = p.local_auth_id WHERE l.local_auth_id = #{localAuthId}

SELECT l.local_auth_id, l.username, l.password, l.create_time, l.last_edit_time, p.user_id, p.name, p.gender, p.email, p.user_type, p.create_time, p.last_edit_time, p.enable_status FROM tb_local_auth l LEFT JOIN tb_person_info p ON l.local_auth_id = p.local_auth_id WHERE l.username = #{username} AND l.password = #{password}

SELECT l.local_auth_id, l.username, l.password, l.create_time, l.last_edit_time FROM tb_local_auth l LEFT JOIN tb_person_info p ON l.local_auth_id = p.local_auth_id WHERE l.username = #{username} AND p.enable_status = 1
